Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE emp IS RECORD(
  3  		emp_no 		EMPLOYEES.EMPLOYEE_ID%TYPE;
  4  		fn		EMPLOYEES.FIRST_NAME%TYPE;
  5  		os		EMPLOYEES.SALARY%TYPE;
  6  		ns		EMPLOYEES.SALARY%TYPE;
  7  	);
  8  	rec_emp 	emp;
  9  BEGIN
 10  	SELECT 		employee_id,
 11  			first_name,
 12  			salary,
 13  			salary*10
 14  	INTO 		rec_emp
 15  	FROM 		employees
 16  	WHERE  		employee_id = 150;
 17  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(rec_emp.fn);
 18* END;
 19  /
		emp_no 		EMPLOYEES.EMPLOYEE_ID%TYPE;
		       		                          *

Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE loc IS RECORD(
  3  		saddress	locations.STREET_ADDRESS%type,
  4  		city		locations.city%type,
  5  		cd		countries%ROWTYPE
  6  	);
  7  	rec_loc_con	loc;
  8  BEGIN
  9  	SELECT 		l.street_address,
 10  			l.city,
 11  			c.country_id,
 12  			c.country_name,
 13  			c.region_id
 14  	INTO 		rec_loc_con.saddress,
 15  			rec_loc_con.city,
 16  			rec_loc_con.cd.country_id,
 17  			rec_loc_con.cd.country_name,
 18  			rec_loc_con.cd.region_id,
 19  	FROM 		locations l,
 20  			countries c
 21  	WHERE  		l.location_id = 1000 AND
 22  			c.country_id = l.country_id;
 23  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(rec_loc_con.city);
 24* END;
 25  /
	FROM 		locations l,
	*
ERROR at line 19:
ORA-06550: line 19, column 2: 
PL/SQL: ORA-00936: missing expression 
ORA-06550: line 9, column 2: 
PL/SQL: SQL Statement ignored

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE loc IS RECORD(
  3  		saddress	locations.STREET_ADDRESS%type,
  4  		city		locations.city%type,
  5  		cd		countries%ROWTYPE
  6  	);
  7  	rec_loc_con	loc;
  8  BEGIN

 10  			l.city,
 11  			c.country_id,
 12  			c.country_name,
 13  			c.region_id
 14  	INTO 		rec_loc_con.saddress,

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  6  BEGIN
  7  	tbl_emp(10):='1236';
  8  	tbl_emp(23):='8040';
  9  	tbl_emp(2):='1111';
 10  	tbl_emp(42):='2000';
 11  	tbl_emp(20):='1998';
 12  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(2));
 13  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(10));
 14  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(23));
 15  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(42));
 16  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(20));
 17  	IF tbl_emp.EXISTS(100) THEN
 18  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('EXISTS 2 OK');
 19  	END IF;
 20  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('100' ||tbl_emp(100));
 21  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('first '||tbl_emp.first);	
 22  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('next(2)'||tbl_emp.next(2));	
 23  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('prior(2)'||tbl_emp.prior(2));
 24  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('count '||tbl_emp.count);
 25* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  6  	v_min		number;
  7  	v_max		number;
  8  BEGIN
  9  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 10  			MAX(employee_id)
 11  	into 		v_min,
 12  			v_max
 13  	from		employees;
 14  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max
 15  		vn_count(i):= 	SELECT	employee_id
 16  				FROM	employees
 17  				WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 18  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(vn_count(i));	
 19  	END LOOP;
 20* END;
 21  /

		*

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  6  	v_min		number;
  7  	v_max		number;
  8  BEGIN
  9  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 10  			MAX(employee_id)
 11  	into 		v_min,
 12  			v_max
 13  	from		employees;
 14  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 15  		SELECT	employee_id
 16  		INTO tbl_emp(i)
 17  		FROM	employees
 18  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 19  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(vn_count(i));	
 20  	END LOOP;
 21* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  6  	v_min		number;
  7  	v_max		number;

  9  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 10  			MAX(employee_id)
 11  	into 		v_min,
 12  			v_max
 13  	from		employees;
 14  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 15  		SELECT	employee_id
 16  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i)
 17  		FROM	employees
 18  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 19  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 20  	END LOOP;
 21* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  6  	v_min		number;
  7  	v_max		number;
  8  BEGIN
  9  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 10  			MAX(employee_id)
 11  	into 		v_min,
 12  			v_max
 13  	from		employees;
 14  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 15  		SELECT	employee_id
 16  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i)
 17  		FROM	employees
 18  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 19  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 20  	END LOOP;
 21  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp);
 22* END;
SQL> /
	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp);
	*

PLS-00306: wrong number or types of arguments in call to 'PUT_LINE'

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  6  	v_min		number;
  7  	v_max		number;
  8  BEGIN
  9  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 10  			MAX(employee_id)
 11  	into 		v_min,
 12  			v_max
 13  	from		employees;
 14  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 15  		SELECT	employee_id
 16  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i)
 17  		FROM	employees
 18  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 19  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 20  	END LOOP;
 21  	DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT(tbl_emp);
 22* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		--employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		employees.first_name%TYPE
  5  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  6  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  7  	v_min		number;
  8  	v_max		number;
  9  BEGIN
 10  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 11  			MAX(employee_id)
 12  	into 		v_min,
 13  			v_max
 14  	from		employees;
 15  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 16  		SELECT	first_name
 17  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i)
 18  		FROM	employees
 19  		WHERE 	employee_id = i;

SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		employees.first_name%TYPE
  5  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  6  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  7  	v_min		number;
  8  	v_max		number;
  9  BEGIN
 10  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 11  			MAX(employee_id)
 12  	into 		v_min,
 13  			v_max
 14  	from		employees;
 15  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 16  		SELECT	first_name,
 17  			employee_id
 18  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i)
 19  		FROM	employees
 20  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 21  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 22  	END LOOP;
 23  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 24  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));
 25  	END LOOP;
 26* END;
SQL> /
		employees.first_name%TYPE
		*

like4 likec between || multiset member submultiset

  4  		employees.first_name%TYPE
  5  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;

Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	TYPE type_rec_fn IS TABLE OF
  6  		employees.first_name%TYPE
  7  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  8  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  9  	tbl_fn		type_rec_fn;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	first_name,
 20  			employee_id
 21  		INTO 	tbl_fn(i),
 22  			tbl_emp(i)
 23  		FROM	employees
 24  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 25  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 26  	END LOOP;
 27  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 28  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));
 29  	END LOOP;
 30* END;

PL/SQL procedure successfully completed.

SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	TYPE type_rec_fn IS TABLE OF
  6  		employees.first_name%TYPE
  7  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  8  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  9  	tbl_fn		type_rec_fn;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	first_name,
 20  			employee_id
 21  		INTO 	tbl_fn(i),
 22  			tbl_emp(i)
 23  		FROM	employees
 24  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 25  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 26  	END LOOP;
 27  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 28  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i) ||' '|| tbl_emp(i));
 29  	END LOOP;
 30* END;
SQL> /

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_rec_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		employees.employee_id%TYPE 
  4  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  5  	TYPE type_rec_fn IS TABLE OF
  6  		employees.first_name%TYPE
  7  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  8  	tbl_emp		type_rec_emp;
  9  	tbl_fn		type_rec_fn;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	first_name,
 20  			employee_id
 21  		INTO 	tbl_fn(i),
 22  			tbl_emp(i)
 23  		FROM	employees
 24  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 25  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 26  	END LOOP;
 27  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 28  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i) ||' '|| tbl_fn(i));
 29  	END LOOP;
 30* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  3  		TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  4  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  5  			v_fn		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  6  			v_ls		employees.employee_id%TYPE
  7  		);
  8  		rec_emp
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 11  	v_min		number;
 12  	v_max		number;
 13  BEGIN
 14  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 15  			MAX(employee_id)
 16  	into 		v_min,
 17  			v_max
 18  	from		employees;
 19  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 20  		SELECT	first_name,
 21  			employee_id,
 22  			last_name
 23  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_fn,
 24  			tbl_emp(i).v_eID,
 25  			tbl_emp(i).v_ls
 26  		FROM	employees
 27  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 28  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 29  	END LOOP;
 30  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 31  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i) ||' '|| tbl_fn(i));
 32  	END LOOP;
 33* END;
 34  /
		TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
		     *
ERROR at line 3:
ORA-06550: line 3, column 8: 
PLS-00103: Encountered the symbol "REC_EMP" when expecting one of the following: 
. ( @ % ; not null range alter index character

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  			v_fn		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  5  			v_ls		employees.employee_id%TYPE
  6  		);
  7  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  8  		rec_emp
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 11  	v_min		number;
 12  	v_max		number;
 13  BEGIN
 14  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 15  			MAX(employee_id)
 16  	into 		v_min,
 17  			v_max
 18  	from		employees;
 19  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 20  		SELECT	first_name,
 21  			employee_id,
 22  			last_name
 23  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_fn,
 24  			tbl_emp(i).v_eID,
 25  			tbl_emp(i).v_ls
 26  		FROM	employees
 27  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 28  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 29  	END LOOP;
 30  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 31  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i) ||' '|| tbl_fn(i));
 32  	END LOOP;
 33* END;
 34  /
		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i) ||' '|| tbl_fn(i));
		                     *
ERROR at line 31:
ORA-06550: line 31, column 24: 
PLS-00306: wrong number or types of arguments in call to '||' 
ORA-06550: line 31, column 3: 
PL/SQL: Statement ignored 


SQL> ed

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  			v_fn		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  5  			v_ls		employees.employee_id%TYPE
  6  		);
  7  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  8  		rec_emp
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 11  	v_min		number;
 12  	v_max		number;
 13  BEGIN
 14  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 15  			MAX(employee_id)
 16  	into 		v_min,
 17  			v_max
 18  	from		employees;
 19  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 20  		SELECT	first_name,
 21  			employee_id,
 22  			last_name
 23  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_fn,
 24  			tbl_emp(i).v_eID,
 25  			tbl_emp(i).v_ls
 26  		FROM	employees
 27  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 28  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 29  	END LOOP;
 30  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 31  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).v_fn ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).v_eID);
 32  	END LOOP;
 33* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  			v_fn		employees.first_name%TYPE,
  5  			v_ls		employees.last_name%TYPE
  6  		);
  7  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  8  		rec_emp
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 11  	v_min		number;
 12  	v_max		number;
 13  BEGIN
 14  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 15  			MAX(employee_id)
 16  	into 		v_min,
 17  			v_max
 18  	from		employees;
 19  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 20  		SELECT	first_name,
 21  			employee_id,
 22  			last_name
 23  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_fn,
 24  			tbl_emp(i).v_eID,
 25  			tbl_emp(i).v_ls
 26  		FROM	employees
 27  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 28  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 29  	END LOOP;
 30  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 31  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).v_fn ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).v_eID);
 32  	END LOOP;
 33* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  			v_fn		employees.first_name%TYPE,
  5  			v_ls		employees.last_name%TYPE
  6  		);
  7  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  8  		rec_emp
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 11  	v_min		number;
 12  	v_max		number;
 13  BEGIN
 14  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 15  			MAX(employee_id)
 16  	into 		v_min,
 17  			v_max
 18  	from		employees;
 19  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 20  		SELECT	first_name,
 21  			employee_id,
 22  			last_name
 23  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_fn,
 24  			tbl_emp(i).v_eID,
 25  			tbl_emp(i).v_ls
 26  		FROM	employees
 27  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 28  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 29  	END LOOP;
 30  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 31  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).v_fn ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).v_eID ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).v_ls);
 32  	END LOOP;
 33* END;

SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	/*TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  			v_fn		employees.first_name%TYPE,
  5  			v_ls		employees.last_name%TYPE
  6  		);*/
  7  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  8  		rec_emp		employees%ROWTYPE;
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 11  	v_min		number;
 12  	v_max		number;
 13  BEGIN
 14  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 15  			MAX(employee_id)
 16  	into 		v_min,
 17  			v_max
 18  	from		employees;
 19  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 20  		SELECT	first_name,
 21  			employee_id,
 22  			last_name
 23  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).first_name,
 24  			tbl_emp(i).employee_id,
 25  			tbl_emp(i).last_name
 26  		FROM	employees
 27  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 28  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 29  	END LOOP;
 30  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 31  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).v_fn ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).v_eID ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).v_ls);
 32  	END LOOP;
 33* END;
SQL> /
		rec_emp		employees%ROWTYPE;
		       		*

begin function pragma procedure subtype type <an identifier> 
<a double-quoted delimited-identifier> current cursor delete 
exists prior

Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	/*TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  			v_fn		employees.first_name%TYPE,
  5  			v_ls		employees.last_name%TYPE
  6  		);*/
  7  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  8  		employees%ROWTYPE
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 11  	v_min		number;
 12  	v_max		number;
 13  BEGIN
 14  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 15  			MAX(employee_id)
 16  	into 		v_min,
 17  			v_max
 18  	from		employees;
 19  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 20  		SELECT	*
 21  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i)
 22  		FROM	employees
 23  		WHERE 	employee_id = i; 
 24  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 25  	END LOOP;
 26  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 27  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).first_name ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).employee_id ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).last_name);
 28  	END LOOP;
 29* END;
 30  /

SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  			v_fn		employees.first_name%TYPE,
  5  			v_ls		employees.last_name%TYPE,
  6  			v_dn		departments.departnemt_name%TYPE
  7  		);
  8  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  9  		rec_emp
 10  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 11  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 12  	v_min		number;
 13  	v_max		number;
 14  BEGIN
 15  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 16  			MAX(employee_id)
 17  	into 		v_min,
 18  			v_max
 19  	from		employees;
 20  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 21  		SELECT	e.employee_id,
 22  			e.first_name,
 23  			e.last_name,
 24  			d.department_name
 25  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_eID,
 26  			tbl_emp(i).v_fn,
 27  			tbl_emp(i).v_ls,
 28  			tbl_emp(i).v_dn,
 29  		FROM	employees e,
 30  			departments d
 31  		WHERE 	employee_id = i and
 32  			e.department_id = d.employee_id; 
 33  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 34  	END LOOP;
 35  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 36  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).v_eID ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).v_fn||' '|| tbl_emp(i).v_ls||' '||tbl_emp(i).v_dn);
 37  	END LOOP;
 38* END;
SQL> /
		FROM	employees e,
		*
ERROR at line 29:
ORA-06550: line 29, column 3: 
PL/SQL: ORA-00936: missing expression 
ORA-06550: line 21, column 3: 
PL/SQL: SQL Statement ignored

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			v_eID		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  			v_fn		employees.first_name%TYPE,
  5  			v_ls		employees.last_name%TYPE,
  6  			v_dn		departments.departnemt_name%TYPE
  7  		);
  8  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  9  		rec_emp
 10  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 11  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 12  	v_min		number;
 13  	v_max		number;
 14  BEGIN
 15  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 16  			MAX(employee_id)
 17  	into 		v_min,
 18  			v_max
 19  	from		employees;
 20  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 21  		SELECT	e.employee_id,
 22  			e.first_name,
 23  			e.last_name,
 24  			d.department_name
 25  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_eID,
 26  			tbl_emp(i).v_fn,
 27  			tbl_emp(i).v_ls,

 29  		FROM	employees e,
 30  			departments d
 31  		WHERE 	employee_id = i and
 32  			e.department_id = d.employee_id; 
 33  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 34  	END LOOP;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			rec_e		employees%ROWTYPE,
  4  			v_dn		departments.department_name%TYPE
  5  		);
  6  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  7  		rec_emp
  8  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;

 10  	v_min		number;

 14  			MAX(employee_id)

 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;

 19  		SELECT	*
 20  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).rec_e

204 Hermann Baer

SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			rec_e		employees%ROWTYPE,
  4  			v_dn		departments.department_name%TYPE
  5  		);
  6  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  7  		rec_emp
  8  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  9  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	*
 20  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).rec_e
 21  		FROM	employees
 22  		WHERE 	employee_id = i;
 23  	END LOOP;
 24  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 25  		SELECT	department_id
 26  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_dn
 27  		FROM	departments
 28  		WHERE 	department_id = tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id;
 29  	--DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i));	
 30  	END LOOP;
 31  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 32  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).rec_e.employee_id ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.first_name||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.last_name);
 33  	END LOOP;
 34* END;
SQL> /
DECLARE
*
ERROR at line 1:
ORA-01403: no data found 
ORA-06512: at line 25 


SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			rec_e		employees%ROWTYPE,
  4  			v_dn		departments.department_name%TYPE
  5  		);
  6  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  7  		rec_emp
  8  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  9  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	*
 20  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).rec_e
 21  		FROM	employees
 22  		WHERE 	employee_id = i;
 23  		SELECT	department_name
 24  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_dn
 25  		FROM	departments
 26  		WHERE 	department_id = tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id;
 27  	END LOOP;
 28  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 29  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).rec_e.employee_id ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.first_name||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.last_name);
 30  	END LOOP;
 31* END;
 32  /

PL/SQL procedure successfully completed.

SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  		vc_id		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  		vc_first	employees.first_name%TYPE,
  5  		vc_last		employees.last_name%TYPE,
  6  		vn_depname	departments.department_name%TYPE);
  7  	TYPE cpy_emp IS TABLE OF
  8  		rec_emp
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	 table1 cpy_emp; 
 11  	i NUMBER;
 12  	j NUMBER;    
 13  BEGIN
 14  	SELECT MIN(employee_id),MAX(employee_id)
 15  	INTO i,j
 16  	FROM EMPLOYEES;
 17  	FOR x IN i..j LOOP
 18  		SELECT e.employee_id,e.first_name,e.last_name,d.department_name
 19  		INTO table1(x).vc_id,table1(x).vc_first,table1(x).vc_last,table1(x).vn_depname
 20  		FROM EMPLOYEES e,departments d
 21  		WHERE employee_id=x AND (e.department_id=d.department_id OR e.department_id=NULL) ;
 22  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(table1(x).vc_id||' '||table1(x).vc_first||' '||table1(x).vc_last||' '||table1(x).vn_depname);
 23  	END LOOP;
 24  END;
 25* /
 26  /
/
*
ERROR at line 25:
ORA-06550: line 25, column 1: 
PLS-00103: Encountered the symbol "/" The symbol "/" was ignored. 


SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  		vc_id		employees.employee_id%TYPE,
  4  		vc_first	employees.first_name%TYPE,
  5  		vc_last		employees.last_name%TYPE,
  6  		vn_depname	departments.department_name%TYPE);
  7  	TYPE cpy_emp IS TABLE OF
  8  		rec_emp
  9  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 10  	 table1 cpy_emp; 
 11  	i NUMBER;
 12  	j NUMBER;    
 13  BEGIN
 14  	SELECT MIN(employee_id),MAX(employee_id)
 15  	INTO i,j
 16  	FROM EMPLOYEES;
 17  	FOR x IN i..j LOOP
 18  		SELECT e.employee_id,e.first_name,e.last_name,d.department_name
 19  		INTO table1(x).vc_id,table1(x).vc_first,table1(x).vc_last,table1(x).vn_depname
 20  		FROM EMPLOYEES e,departments d
 21  		WHERE employee_id=x AND (e.department_id=d.department_id OR e.department_id=NULL) ;
 22  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(table1(x).vc_id||' '||table1(x).vc_first||' '||table1(x).vc_last||' '||table1(x).vn_depname);
 23  	END LOOP;
 24* END;
 25  /

*
ERROR at line 1:
ORA-01403: no data found 
ORA-06512: at line 18 


SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			rec_e		employees%ROWTYPE,
  4  			v_dn		departments.department_name%TYPE
  5  		);
  6  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  7  		rec_emp
  8  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  9  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	*
 20  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).rec_e
 21  		FROM	employees
 22  		WHERE 	employee_id = i;
 23  		SELECT	department_name
 24  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_dn
 25  		FROM	departments
 26  		WHERE 	department_id = tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id;
 27  	END LOOP;
 28  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 29  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).rec_e.employee_id ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.first_name||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.last_name||' '||tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id);
 30  	END LOOP;
 31* END;
 32  /

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			rec_e		employees%ROWTYPE,
  4  			v_dn		departments.department_name%TYPE
  5  		);
  6  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  7  		rec_emp
  8  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  9  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	*
 20  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).rec_e
 21  		FROM	employees
 22  		WHERE 	employee_id = i;
 23  	BEGIN
 24  		SELECT	department_name
 25  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_dn
 26  		FROM	departments
 27  		WHERE 	department_id = tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id;
 28  	EXCEPTIONS
 29  	WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 30  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('execption'|| department_id);
 31  	END;
 32  	END LOOP;
 33  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 34  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).rec_e.employee_id ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.first_name||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.last_name||' '||tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id);
 35  	END LOOP;
 36* END;
 37  /
	WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
	*
ERROR at line 29:
ORA-06550: line 29, column 2: 
PLS-00103: Encountered the symbol "WHEN" when expecting one of the following: 
:= . ( @ % ; 
ORA-06550: line 32, column 6: 
PLS-00103: Encountered the symbol "LOOP" when expecting one of the following: 
; 
ORA-06550: line 36, column 4: 
PLS-00103: Encountered the symbol "end-of-file" when expecting one of the following: 
end not pragma final instantiable order overriding static 
member constructor map

Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			rec_e		employees%ROWTYPE,
  4  			v_dn		departments.department_name%TYPE
  5  		);
  6  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  7  		rec_emp
  8  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  9  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	*
 20  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).rec_e
 21  		FROM	employees
 22  		WHERE 	employee_id = i;
 23  	BEGIN
 24  		SELECT	department_name
 25  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_dn
 26  		FROM	departments
 27  		WHERE 	department_id = tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id;
 28  	EXCEPTION
 29  	WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 30  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('execption'|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id || tbl_emp(i).rec_e.employee_id);
 31  	END;
 32  	END LOOP;
 33  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 34  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).rec_e.employee_id ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.first_name||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.last_name||' '||tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id);
 35  	END LOOP;
 36* END;

Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			rec_e		employees%ROWTYPE,
  4  			v_dn		departments.department_name%TYPE
  5  		);
  6  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
  7  		rec_emp
  8  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
  9  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 10  	v_min		number;
 11  	v_max		number;
 12  BEGIN
 13  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 14  			MAX(employee_id)
 15  	into 		v_min,
 16  			v_max
 17  	from		employees;
 18  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 19  		SELECT	*
 20  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).rec_e
 21  		FROM	employees
 22  		WHERE 	employee_id = i;
 23  	BEGIN
 24  		SELECT	department_name
 25  		INTO 	tbl_emp(i).v_dn
 26  		FROM	departments
 27  		WHERE 	department_id = tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id;
 28  	EXCEPTION
 29  	WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 30  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('execption'|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id || tbl_emp(i).rec_e.employee_id);
 31  	END;
 32  	END LOOP;
 33  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 34  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).rec_e.employee_id ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.first_name||' '|| tbl_emp(i).rec_e.last_name||' '||tbl_emp(i).rec_e.department_id);
 35  	END LOOP;
 36* END;
SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			en		employees.employee_id%type;
  4  			fn		employees.first_name%type;
  5  			sal_before	employees.salary%type;
  6  			sal_after	employees.salary%type;
  7  			no_yr		number;
  8  		);
  9  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
 10  		rec_emp
 11  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 12  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 13  	v_min		number;
 14  	v_max		number;
 15  BEGIN
 16  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 17  			MAX(employee_id)
 18  	into 		v_min,
 19  			v_max
 20  	from		employees;
 21  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 22  		SELECT 		TRUNC((SYSDATE - hire_date)/365), salary,employee_id,first_name
 23  		INTO		tbl_emp(i).no_yr,sal_before,en, fn
 24  		FROM		employees;
 25  		IF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >25 THEN
 26  			sal_after := sal_before*1.30;
 27  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >20 THEN
 28  			sal_after := sal_before*1.20;
 29  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >10 THEN
 30  			sal_after := sal_before*1.1;
 31  		ELSE
 32  			sal_after := sal_before*1.05;
 33  		END IF;
 34  	END LOOP;
 35  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 36  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).en ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).fn||' '|| tbl_emp(i).sal_before||' '||tbl_emp(i).sal_after);
 37  	END LOOP;
 38* END;
 39  /
			en		employees.employee_id%type;
			  		                          *
ERROR at line 3:
ORA-06550: line 3, column 34: 
PLS-00103: Encountered the symbol ";" when expecting one of the following: 
:= ( ) , not null range default external character 
The symbol ")" was substituted for ";" to continue. 
ORA-06550: line 8, column 3: 
PLS-00103: Encountered the symbol ")" when expecting one of the following: 
begin function pragma procedure subtype type <an identifier> 
<a double-quoted delimited-identifier> current cursor delete 
exists prior

  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			en		employees.employee_id%type,
  4  			fn		employees.first_name%type,
  5  			sal_before	employees.salary%type,
  6  			sal_after	employees.salary%type,
  7  			no_yr		number
  8  		);
  9  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
 10  		rec_emp
 11  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 12  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 13  	v_min		number;
 14  	v_max		number;
 15  BEGIN
 16  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 17  			MAX(employee_id)
 18  	into 		v_min,
 19  			v_max
 20  	from		employees;
 21  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 22  		SELECT 		TRUNC((SYSDATE - hire_date)/365), salary,employee_id,first_name
 23  		INTO		tbl_emp(i).no_yr,sal_before,en, fn
 24  		FROM		employees;
 25  		IF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >25 THEN
 26  			sal_after := sal_before*1.30;
 27  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >20 THEN
 28  			sal_after := sal_before*1.20;
 29  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >10 THEN
 30  			sal_after := sal_before*1.1;
 31  		ELSE
 32  			sal_after := sal_before*1.05;
 33  		END IF;
 34  	END LOOP;
 35  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 36  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).en ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).fn||' '|| tbl_emp(i).sal_before||' '||tbl_emp(i).sal_after);
 37  	END LOOP;
 38* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			en		employees.employee_id%type,
  4  			fn		employees.first_name%type,
  5  			sal_before	employees.salary%type,
  6  			sal_after	employees.salary%type,
  7  			no_yr		number
  8  		);
  9  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
 10  		rec_emp
 11  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 12  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 13  	v_min		number;
 14  	v_max		number;
 15  BEGIN
 16  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 17  			MAX(employee_id)
 18  	into 		v_min,
 19  			v_max
 20  	from		employees;
 21  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 22  		SELECT 		TRUNC((SYSDATE - hire_date)/365), salary,employee_id,first_name
 23  		INTO		tbl_emp(i).no_yr,tbl_emp(i).sal_before,tbl_emp(i).en, tbl_emp(i).fn
 24  		FROM		employees;
 25  		IF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >25 THEN
 26  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.30;
 27  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >20 THEN
 28  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.20;
 29  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >10 THEN
 30  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.1;
 31  		ELSE
 32  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.05;
 33  		END IF;
 34  	END LOOP;
 35  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 36  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).en ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).fn||' '|| tbl_emp(i).sal_before||' '||tbl_emp(i).sal_after);
 37  	END LOOP;
 38* END;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			en		employees.employee_id%type,
  4  			fn		employees.first_name%type,
  5  			sal_before	employees.salary%type,
  6  			sal_after	employees.salary%type,
  7  			no_yr		number
  8  		);
  9  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
 10  		rec_emp
 11  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 12  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 13  	v_min		number;
 14  	v_max		number;
 15  BEGIN
 16  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 17  			MAX(employee_id)
 18  	into 		v_min,
 19  			v_max
 20  	from		employees;
 21  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 22  		SELECT 		TRUNC((SYSDATE - hire_date)/365), 
 23  				salary,
 24  				employee_id,
 25  				first_name
 26  		INTO		tbl_emp(i).no_yr,
 27  				tbl_emp(i).sal_before,
 28  				tbl_emp(i).en, 
 29  				tbl_emp(i).fn
 30  		FROM		employees;
 31  		IF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >25 THEN
 32  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.30;
 33  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >20 THEN
 34  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.20;
 35  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >10 THEN
 36  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.1;
 37  		ELSE
 38  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.05;
 39  		END IF;
 40  	END LOOP;
 41  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 42  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).en ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).fn||' '|| tbl_emp(i).sal_before||' '||tbl_emp(i).sal_after);
 43  	END LOOP;

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			en		employees.employee_id%type,
  4  			fn		employees.first_name%type,
  5  			sal_before	employees.salary%type,
  6  			sal_after	employees.salary%type,
  7  			no_yr		number
  8  		);
  9  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
 10  		rec_emp
 11  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 12  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 13  	v_min		number;
 14  	v_max		number;
 15  BEGIN
 16  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 17  			MAX(employee_id)
 18  	into 		v_min,
 19  			v_max
 20  	from		employees;
 21  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 22  		SELECT 		TRUNC((SYSDATE - hire_date)/365), 
 23  				salary,
 24  				employee_id,
 25  				first_name
 26  		INTO		tbl_emp(i).no_yr,
 27  				tbl_emp(i).sal_before,
 28  				tbl_emp(i).en, 
 29  				tbl_emp(i).fn
 30  		FROM		employees
 31  		WHERE employee_id = i;
 32  		IF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >25 THEN
 33  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.30;
 34  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >20 THEN
 35  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.20;
 36  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >10 THEN
 37  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.1;
 38  		ELSE
 39  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.05;
 40  		END IF;
 41  	END LOOP;
 42  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 43  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).en ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).fn||' '|| tbl_emp(i).sal_before||' '||tbl_emp(i).sal_after);
 44  	END LOOP;
 45* END;

PL/SQL procedure successfully completed.

SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			en		employees.employee_id%type,
  4  			fn		employees.first_name%type,
  5  			sal_before	employees.salary%type,
  6  			sal_after	employees.salary%type,
  7  			no_yr		number
  8  		);
  9  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
 10  		rec_emp
 11  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 12  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 13  	v_min		number;
 14  	v_max		number;
 15  BEGIN
 16  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 17  			MAX(employee_id)
 18  	into 		v_min,
 19  			v_max
 20  	from		employees;
 21  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 22  		SELECT 		TRUNC((SYSDATE - hire_date)/365), 
 23  				salary,
 24  				employee_id,
 25  				first_name
 26  		INTO		tbl_emp(i).no_yr,
 27  				tbl_emp(i).sal_before,
 28  				tbl_emp(i).en, 
 29  				tbl_emp(i).fn
 30  		FROM		employees
 31  		WHERE employee_id = i;
 32  		IF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >25 THEN
 33  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.30;
 34  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >20 THEN
 35  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.20;
 36  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >10 THEN
 37  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.1;
 38  		ELSE
 39  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.05;
 40  		END IF;
 41  	END LOOP;
 42  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 43  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).en ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).fn||' '|| tbl_emp(i).sal_before||' '||tbl_emp(i).sal_after||' '||tbl_emp(i).no_yr);
 44  	END LOOP;
 45* END;

PL/SQL procedure successfully completed.

SQL> ed
Wrote file afiedt.buf

  1  DECLARE
  2  	TYPE rec_emp IS RECORD(
  3  			en		employees.employee_id%type,
  4  			fn		employees.first_name%type,
  5  			sal_before	employees.salary%type,
  6  			sal_after	employees.salary%type,
  7  			no_yr		number
  8  		);
  9  	TYPE type_emp IS TABLE OF
 10  		rec_emp
 11  		INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
 12  	tbl_emp		type_emp;
 13  	v_min		number;
 14  	v_max		number;
 15  BEGIN
 16  	select 		MIN(employee_id),
 17  			MAX(employee_id)
 18  	into 		v_min,
 19  			v_max
 20  	from		employees;
 21  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 22  		SELECT 		TRUNC((SYSDATE - hire_date)/365), 
 23  				salary,
 24  				employee_id,
 25  				first_name
 26  		INTO		tbl_emp(i).no_yr,
 27  				tbl_emp(i).sal_before,
 28  				tbl_emp(i).en, 
 29  				tbl_emp(i).fn
 30  		FROM		employees
 31  		WHERE employee_id = i;
 32  		IF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >25 THEN
 33  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.30;
 34  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >20 THEN
 35  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.20;
 36  		ELSIF tbl_emp(i).no_yr >10 THEN
 37  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.1;
 38  		ELSE
 39  			tbl_emp(i).sal_after := tbl_emp(i).sal_before*1.05;
 40  		END IF;
 41  	END LOOP;
 42  	FOR i IN v_min..v_max LOOP
 43  		DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE(tbl_emp(i).en ||' '|| tbl_emp(i).fn||' '|| tbl_emp(i).sal_before||' '||tbl_emp(i).sal_after||' '||tbl_emp(i).no_yr);
 44  	END LOOP;
 45* END;
SQL> spool off
